item.description:
The below event has been cancelled to avoid overlap with the Central Square Pub Crawl. Please sign up for the Crawl.

 

SATURDAY NIGHT SOCIAL IN SOMERVILLE!

The Joshua Tree is letting us have an area next to the bar for the evening at no charge. There will be a DJ and dancing later in the evening.

They have a menu and cocktails. Click here.

COVER: The GM told me there was no cover. In my experience, bars will institute a cover later on even if it is not advertised, which is why I encourage you to get there close to the start time of 6pm. If you arrive late and they try to institute a cover charge, try saying that you're with the group at the bar.

LINE: I do not know if lines form, but I assume they would seeing as it's Davis Square on a Saturday night.

CHECK THIS SITE BEFORE YOU LEAVE YOUR HOUSE AS I MIGHT HAVE TO CHANGE VENUES!!!!

DATING: This is not a dating event - this is a social event centered around dancing and mingling.

INFORMATION: I've never been here, so if anyone has any advice or info please let me know.

FACEBOOK: Copy and paste this as an event on your FB and invite your buddies. The more the merrier.

DOUBLE BOOKING: Only RSVP to one site so I can have a correct head count (I'm posting this on Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, and Boston Happy Hour).

OTHER ORGANIZERS: Please feel free to post this on your meetup groups (Just let me know!).
item.how_to_find_us: We have our own area next to the bar
item.name: Joshua Tree Event Cancelled-Sign up for Central Square Pub Crawl
